name: CXAction
desc: An abstract class that declares a programmatic interface for objects that represent a telephony action.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new telephony action with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier for the action.

items.name: var isComplete: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the action has been performed by the provider.

items.name: var timeoutDate: Date
items.desc: The time after which the action cannot be completed.

items.name: func fulfill()
items.desc: Reports the successful execution of the action.

items.name: func fail()
items.desc: Reports the failed execution of the action.
